definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: He read the Bengali poets from an early age and began writing poetry himself at the age of eight.
sentences.chinese: 他閱讀了大量孟加拉語詩歌，八歲即能詩。

sentences.english: I need a Bangla blog to develop.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一個孟加拉語博客發展。

sentences.english: By the time I was 6 my parents had taught me to read and write Bengali .
sentences.chinese: 在我6歲的時候，父母就教我讀寫孟加拉語。

sentences.english: Among the subjects we discussed was Bengali orthography.
sentences.chinese: 在我們討論過的話題當中，有孟加拉語的拼字法。
